column3:
ACK.

No need for a new pullreq, though. You can just do a forced push to the branch you used for the old pullreq, and it will automatically be updated.

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/91855f279d27c3772b70c6e491684ed74684685e for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

ACK

And echo @sipa's comment.  "git push --force" will update the branch of the previous pullreq.
